
[Docs](https://malt3d.com) | [Forums & Support](https://github.com/bnpr/Malt/discussions) | [Bug Reports](https://github.com/bnpr/Malt/issues)

### Requirements

- OpenGL 4.1+
- Blender 3.2

> A dedicated Nvidia or AMD graphics card is highly recomended.
